item.title: About
item.description: I am Jitachi, a product designer made of curiosity, stubbornness, and a hint of foolishness, per Professor Utonium's words. Now Since 2021, I’ve been poured my heart and soul into Railway —a modern software deployment and observability platform—as the founding designer. Before Senior Designer at Rainforest / 2020 - 2021 Founding Designer at Kong, Inc / 2015 - 2020
